name: Magical Witch Bell and Her Non-Magical Friends
name_original: Magical Witch Bell and Her Non-Magical Friends
description:
街中に不思議なことが起こっている！ 魔法使いのベルと一緒に謎を解こう。

Yuri Game Jam 2017のために作られたノベルゲーム。
『magical witch bell and her non-magical friends』

~

a magical witch named bell lives in a small non-magical town, where she spends her days fixing trinkets and creating gadgets. she's the only magic user here, but for some reason, magical mishaps have been happening all over town...

MAGICAL WITCH BELL AND HER NON-MAGICAL FRIENDS is a short visual novel (~30 minutes) made for Yuri Game Jam 2017. play as a witch and find out who's behind all the weird occurrences around town and why! 

there's one ending + extra end cards that change depending on your choices throughout. 

the game is free, but if you pay $3 or more, you can support me in my game-making adventures & also get access to the character art used in-game, some pencil sketches and a special end card! 

~

CREDITS: 

story/programming/art by npckc
music/SE from pocket sound
special thanks to mono-frog and sdhizumi
korean translation by kyleheren

~

other things i've worked on can be found here! you can comment right here or on twitter/tumblr with your thoughts. if you like my work and want to support me, you can buy me a coffee!

~

updates:

  • 2017/12/31  now available in japanese and korean!
